column2: As your companions pack your ships with the loot from [From.GetName], a young marauder comes to you. He tells you that he spotted a great spot to build a pirate den. Plenty of your other warriors want to stay here and continue ravaging the land after the rest of you return home.
Just keep the wine cold until my next visit.
A pirate den will be built in [scoped_province.GetName].

You are preparing to move on from [From.GetName] to the next settlement, when a [character_to_join_pirates.GetManWoman] runs past your guards to speak with you. [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHeCap] explains that [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHe] wants to join your forces and live like you. Some of your warriors start to smile behind [character_to_join_pirates.GetHerHim] as [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHe] clearly doesn't know how hard your lives are.
You can come with us... as a prisoner.
Lead this fool back to [character_to_join_pirates.GetHerHis] people.
This is a shady place where pirates gather.
You returned with a great amount of loot to your ports. Now your duty would be to share this with your suzerain so [Root.Suzerain.GetSheHe] will continue to turn a blind eye to your campaigns.
Give [Root.Suzerain.GetHerHim] the biggest chest full of gold.
Send [Root.Suzerain.GetHerHim] a bag of silver or something.
[From.GetBestName] returned with loot to [From.GetHerHis] port. Thanks to tolerating [From.GetHerHis] little campaign, [From.GetSheHe] surprised you with a chest full of gold.
[From.GetBestName] returned with loot to [From.GetHerHis] port. Because you tolerated [From.GetHerHis] little campaign, [From.GetSheHe] sent you a bag of silver.
[From.GetBestName] returned with loot to [From.GetHerHis] port. Despite tolerating [From.GetHerHis] little campaign, [From.GetSheHe] dared not sending you a share of the treasury.
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Make $DEFENDER$ a Corsair State

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak, but if they would just pay you tribute in the form of gold and soldiers you could protect them!

Through war you can force any [oceanic.GetGroupName] realm that you or one of your §YTributary States§! border to pay you §Y9%§! of their income and §Y10%§! of their levy reinforcements as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!, is §RNOT§! §YIndependent§!, has §Rless§! §YRealm Size§! than the §YTributary State§! or §Rdeclines a defensive§! §YCall to Arms§! from the §YTributary State§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can §RNOT§! be called to war.
column3:
§Y$TARGET$§! est faible, mais en vous payant un tribut sous la forme d'or et de soldats, vous pourriez assurer sa protection !

Par la guerre, vous pouvez forcer tout pays frontalier de vous ou de l'un de vos §Y?tats tributaires§! ? vous donner §G20%§! de ses revenus et §G15%§! de ses renforts.
Ce type de tributaire ne se lib?rera que si le §Ysuzerain§! a un §Rprestige n?gatif§!, §Rn'est pas ind?pendant§!, a une §Rtaille de pays inf?rieure§! ? celle de l'?tat tributaire ou §Rd?cline§! un appel aux armes d?fensif de l'?tat tributaire.
Ce type de tributaire §Rne peut pas ?tre appel? ? la guerre§!.
column4:
§Y$TARGET$§! ist schwach, aber wenn sie Tribut in Form von Gold und Soldaten aufbringen w?rden, kfnntet Ihr sie besch?tzen.

Durch Krieg kfnnt Ihr jedes Reich, das entweder an Euch selbst oder einen Eurer §YTributstaaten§! angrenzt, dazu zwingen, §Y20%§! ihres Einkommens und §Y15%§! ihres Aufgebots als Tribut zu zahlen.
Wird nur unabhdngig, wenn der §YSuzerdn§! §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§! hat, §RNICHT§! unabhdngig ist, §Rweniger§! §YReichsgrf?e§! als der §YTributstaat§! hat oder einen §Rdefensiven§! §YRuf zu den Waffen§! eines §YTributstaates§! ablehnt.
Diese Art §YTributstaat§! kann §RNICHT§! in den Krieg gerufen werden.
column6:
§Y$TARGET$§! es d?bil, ?pero puedes protegerlos si te pagan tributo en forma de oro y soldados!

Puedes usar la guerra para que cualquier reino fronterizo contigo o con uno de tus §Yestados tributarios§! te pague el §Y20%§! de sus ingresos y el §Y15%§! de sus refuerzos de leva como tributo.
Solo se liberara si el §Ysoberano§! tiene §Yprestigio§! §Rnegativo§!, §RNO§! es §Yindependiente§!, el §Ytama?o del reino§! es §Rmenor§! que el §Yestado tributario§! o §Rechaza§! una §Yllamada a las armas§! §Ydefensiva§! del §Yestado tributario§!.
Este tipo de §Ytributario§! §RNO§! puede ser llamado a la guerra.

column2: You can choose to give [Root.GetBestName] partial autonomy over their realm in return for being a martial border region.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is mighty enough to prove that [Root.GetSheHe] is dedicated to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], therefore [Root.GetSheHe] would be a better protector of [east_brethren.GetName].
